overview_of_class: This course continues on the strong foundation created in JOUR 201-1 and significantly expands the base of multi-platform tools needed for effective, relevant and engaging storytelling for specific audiences. Instructors will guide students in the continued development of reporting, interviewing, writing and researching with a more sophisticated audience understanding using text, audio, video and photos for print, broadcast and the Web.
name: Multimedia Storytelling
subject: JOUR
